amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Office of Housing by $5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of Housing salaries and expenses account by $5,000,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 248 (Roll no. 426).
